snippet.title: TV Shows Completely Ruined By Bad Actor Replacements
snippet.description:
The cast of a hit TV show is a lot like the inner workings of a clock. When every piece is working in perfect harmony with all the rest, it's truly a thing of beauty. But all it takes is one broken or damaged gear to grind it to a halt.

So when a TV series recasts a principal cast member, things can definitely go awry. Sometimes it's not a problem, or even an improvement, but on occasion, it can more or less break the entire show. Audiences can turn hostile quickly when a fan-favorite leaves or gets replaced, and it's all downhill from there. Here are a few of the TV shows that were ruined by horrible actor replacements.

#TVShows #Actors #Replacements

Dallas | 0:00
Suits | 1:08
Mistresses | 2:12
Dexter | 3:12
American Housewife | 4:07
Last Man Standing | 5:10
Fresh Prince of Bel-Air | 6:05
Bewitched | 7:08
Roseanne | 7:57
Nashville | 8:53
House | 9:50
Beverly Hills, 90210 | 10:36

Read Full Article: https://www.looper.com/35589/actor-replacements-ruined-show/
